keyMoments.title: Admiral Aokiji's Debut
keyMoments.description: Aokiji makes his first appearance in the anime as a Marine Admiral, one of the World Government's three greatest military powers.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most powerful characters in One Piece and establishes the strength gap between the Straw Hats and top-tier Marines.
keyMoments.quote: I'm just out for a walk.

keyMoments.title: Ice Age Debut
keyMoments.description: Aokiji uses Ice Age for the first time, freezing a massive section of ocean along with a Sea King.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the Hie Hie no Mi's incredible power and scale.

keyMoments.title: Mentions Luffy's Grandfather
keyMoments.description: Aokiji reveals he knows Luffy's grandfather and that Luffy resembles him.
keyMoments.significance: First foreshadowing of Monkey D. Garp and his connection to both Luffy and Aokiji.
keyMoments.quote: You're the spitting image of your grandpa. Long ago, he caused a lot of trouble for me.

keyMoments.title: Freezes Robin with Ice Time
keyMoments.description: Aokiji uses Ice Time to freeze Robin completely, leaving the crew horrified.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Aokiji's ruthlessness and sets up the next episode's rescue attempt.

abilities.description: Aokiji places his hand in water and freezes a massive area of ocean, including any creatures within it.
Aokiji freezes grass or other materials with his breath to create a blade-like weapon.
Aokiji freezes anything he touches, including people, by freezing his own body in contact with them.

relationships.description: Aokiji has a dark history with Robin connected to the Ohara incident 20 years ago. He spared her life then but now considers her a threat.

evolutionMoments.description: Aokiji reveals he came to find Robin and considers her presence with the Straw Hats dangerous.

relationships.description: Aokiji knows Luffy's grandfather and sees the family resemblance.

evolutionMoments.description: Aokiji mentions knowing Luffy's grandfather and that he caused trouble for him long ago.

reveals.information: Marine Admiral, one of the three highest-ranking officers
User of the Hie Hie no Mi (Ice-Ice Fruit)
Has history with Nico Robin from the Ohara incident

keyMoments.title: Reveals the Three Admirals
keyMoments.description: Robin explains to the crew about the three Marine Admirals and their role as the World Government's greatest powers.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial world-building information about the Marine hierarchy.
keyMoments.quote: The three Admirals: Akainu, Aokiji, and Kizaru. They are the World Government's three greatest powers.

keyMoments.title: Connection to Aokiji's Past
keyMoments.description: Robin panics upon seeing Aokiji, revealing they share a dark history from 20 years ago.
keyMoments.significance: First hint at Robin's traumatic past with the World Government and the Ohara incident.

keyMoments.title: Uses Treinta Fleur: Clutch
keyMoments.description: Robin attacks Aokiji with Treinta Fleur: Clutch, sprouting thirty arms to grab and break him, though it proves ineffective against his Logia powers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's advanced techniques and her desperation to protect the crew.

keyMoments.title: Stands Her Ground Against Aokiji
keyMoments.description: Despite fear and the crew's pleas to run, Robin stands her ground trying to tell Aokiji she has changed, before being frozen.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's character growth and her determination not to run from her past anymore.
keyMoments.quote: I'm no longer the same as I was before!

abilities.description: Robin sprouts thirty arms to grab an opponent and break their bones using a clutching motion.

relationships.description: Robin has a traumatic history with Aokiji from the Ohara incident 20 years ago and fears him greatly.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin panics upon seeing Aokiji, revealing their dark shared history.

reveals.information: Has a dark history with Admiral Aokiji from 20 years ago
The World Government considers her the most dangerous member of the Straw Hat crew

keyMoments.title: Attacks Aokiji and Gets Frozen
keyMoments.description: Luffy attacks Aokiji with Gomu Gomu no Pistol but gets his fist frozen along with his strongest crewmates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power gap between Luffy and an Admiral.

keyMoments.title: Grandfather Mentioned for First Time
keyMoments.description: Aokiji mentions that Luffy looks exactly like his grandfather and that his grandfather caused trouble for him long ago.
keyMoments.significance: First mention of Luffy having a grandfather, foreshadowing the reveal of Monkey D. Garp.

reveals.information: First mention that Luffy has a grandfather who was powerful enough to trouble a Marine Admiral
